attributes.action: We the British Public call a vote of no confidence in this current administration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British public call for a vote of no confidence with the current administration. The current administration is now no longer representative of the British public views on the current issues concerning the public and is therefore taking decision's without the British publics mandate and best interest's. We therefore call that a general election is called to ensure that the British publics views and interests are ensured and represented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
